name: Clock
description:
This algorithm produces and/or receives analogue clock pulses and/or MIDI clock. It is designed to synchronise the module with others, or with other devices that it communicates with via MIDI, or simply to be a source of clock pulses for other algorithms within the module.

It can generate its own BPM-based clock, or sync to external clock pulses, or sync to MIDI.

It can output clock pulses, or send MIDI clock, or both.

If syncing to external clock, the algorithm expects a 24ppqn DINsync style clock. If you only have a slower clock available, use the Clock multiplier algorithm to get the clock up to the right speed before this algorithm sees it.
use_cases: Synchronizing modules within a Disting system
Providing clock pulses to external MIDI devices
Generating internal BPM-based clock for other algorithms
Syncing to external DINsync-style clock inputs (24ppqn)
gui_description: The display shows the current tempo, and the transport location in bars, beats, and sixteenths. It also shows the clock source, and whether the transport is running or stopped.

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description: The clock source. The options are 'Internal', 'External', and 'MIDI'.

parameters.name: Run
parameters.description: Starts and stops the internal clock.

parameters.name: Time sig denominator
parameters.description: The time signature denominator: one of 1, 2, 4, 8, or 16.

parameters.name: Output to breakout
parameters.description: Enables MIDI output to the breakout.

parameters.name: Output to Select Bus
parameters.description: Enables MIDI output to the Select Bus.
